parameters.name: ConnectionNamePrefix
parameters.description: The key word that you specify to query connections. Connections can be queried by prefixes.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The maximum number of entries to be returned in a single call. You can use this parameter and the NextToken parameter to implement paging.

*   Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
If you set the Limit parameter and excess return values exist, this parameter is returned.

*   Default value: 0.
